page.title: 16LIFE OF A FARMER
page.content: IN THE MORNING THE FARMER HAS TO GET UP EARLY TO MILK THE COWS AND DO OTHER JOBS.THE FARMERS WIFE HAS TO GET IN THE COWS.IT TAKES ABOUT TWO HOURS TO MILK THE COWS OR MORE.THE FARMERS WIFE SOMETIMES DOES THE CALVES.SOME OF THE CALVES DON'T NEED THE MILK.AT ABOUT 10 O'CLOCK THE FARMER HAS HIS BREAKFAST. AFTER BREAKFAST HE GOES OUTSIDE AND DOES SOME SLURRY TANKING OR OTHER THINGS.THEN THE FARMER GOES IN FOR HIS DINNER.AFTER DINNER HE GOES OUT TO DO SOME MORE WORK.AT ABOUT 5'OCLOCK THE FARMER GOES IN FOR TEA.AFTER TEA THE FARMER GOES OUT AGAIN TO MILK THE COWS AND FEED THE CALVES AND AFTER ALL THE JOBS HE GOES BACK INTO THE HOUSE.
